sentence: the staff was very friendly but the food just lacked in my personal opinion
We were also having trouble with our TV not working and when I called the front desk they told me they would put it at the top of their list but never had anyone come to fix it
Front desk people were rude and clueless
Her laundry was taken by staff for decontamination

cabana staff could be more welcoming and friendly our room did not get housekeeping one day of our stay we were out of room from 9AM to 430PM and we were disappointed to come back to a room that had not been cleaned
Also staff did not have any info on tennis lessons or programs and did not know tennis pros name or number
I was told I could schedule a massage but all other services stopped at 4
We had a service man in the room on Monday fixing issues in the bathroom when he noticed the TV and called it down to be repaired
Called down and they sent up security and housekeeping manager to get description because this happens a lot lately were also told all staff has master keys
The Trade Winds had no customer service and seemed only to be interested in selling time shares
The staff always goes above and beyond to help out
Most staff were quite friendly but we had many disappointing experiences
It was Alyx I was very satisfied with her services and will definitely be coming back and requesting her as my server again
Room backed up to more service and storage area
Restaurants were mediocre but staff had a great attitude and were welcoming and the guys around the pool provided excellent entertainment for the children
And staff was friendly for the most part but I encountered not great service at Adventure Center when trying to book a tennis court
The food own property is good and the service is at 10
Upon checkin we were greeted and treated very nicely by everyone we came in contact with
Like the drinks and service by the pool
Traveling with a 3 little ones is not always easy but Marco and the housekeeping staff made sure the rooms and amenities were always clean and with plenty of available towels
His customer service skills will bring me back to Tradewinds
The view itself is worth the money but the staff made us feel welcomed and comfortable on vacation

i really am hard pressed to find a positive but i do find one somebody has gone really out of the way to stress friendliness to the staff because to a person they were very polite and caring about your experience so kudos on training
Make no mistake this is not a budget resort but the amenities and resort staff are top notch
as we have become used to in the States we paid a 10 gratuity which was expected for the service
A group of staff came down to see the commotion laughing amongst themselves which I thought was very insensitive
Being forced into booking a sales pitch with the timeshare team at check
Service was slow and not the quality you had expect from a restaurant like that
The staff here so far has been very nice so far but the hotel sucks and yes is a hotel compared to a real resort
The Konk club was small and crowded at times but the staff was very kind and accommodating
I cut my hand on a cabana and the beach staff did not seem willing to help with my hand being all bloody
The front desk sent up security but then in stopped
I can not say enough good things about the staff at Saltys Tiki Bar especially Ban
They will kick you out promptly at 6pm literally an employee came by and said she has to take everything away to pack it up
